it.polimi.se2018.network

Class RemoteProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<Event>
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.RemoteProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ViewEvent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteProxyRMI, RemoteProxySocket

    public abstract class RemoteProxy
extends Observable<Event>
implements Observer<ViewEvent>
    A class that represents the server on the client side. It dispatchs events from the RemoteView to the server and vice versa
